name: starkness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being empty, simple, or clear, especially without decoration or anything that is not necessary: Despite the starkness of the furnishings, the room is quite comfortable. The alternatives are set before us with unusual starkness. Synonyms
barrenness
bleakness
desolation (EMPTINESS)
grimness (UGLINESS)See
stark
More examplesFewer examplesThe shop has a simple starkness about it, with grey concrete floor, white walls, and geometric partitions.His production has a visual starkness that suits the grim subject matter. Throughout the book the author captures the starkness of life on the high plains of North Dakota.
